title: PamogiDAO
author: PamogiDAO
content: PamogiAn idea-building platform that allows entrepreneurs, freelancers, and investors to collaborate.Problem:Building an idea from scratch is hard and almost impossiblewithout a network capable of helping youThe growing challenges of project realization» Complexity of realizing ideas and managing projects/initiatives» Talent is equally distributed, the opportunity is not» Fragmentation of knowledge and skillsPamogi SolutionThere are a lot of people worldwide that are looking for ideas to contribute to, but they don't know where they can find them. Pamogi connects them with the idea providers in a single ecosystem where 5 existing elements are brought together to enable borderless collaboration.»Freelance platform»Gaming, metaverse»Project management»Crowdfunding»BlockchainConnecting Talented individuals, regardless of their circumstances can connect, create and collaborate. Bringing everyone together under one platformBuildingCollaboration through ideas, suggestions, tasks, and fundraising. Each project is able to start its own world and use project management tools.PlayingGamification and blockchain elements offer additional reward structures, visibility, and interaction for a project during its creation, implementation, and growth phases.Social Links:Website: https://pamogi.org/Twitter: https://twitter.com/Pamogi_DAOLinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/pamogi/Discord: https://discord.gg/g383VY5dXa
